Question
========

1.  Elvis Presley.$ 52 miljoen
2.  Charles M. Schulz, \$ 33 million 3.  Heath Ledger, eds.$ 20 miljoen
4.  Albert Einstein, \$ 18 million 5.  Aaron Spelling, eds.$ 15 miljoen
6.  Dr. Seuss (Theodor Geisel), \$ 12 million. *Source: www.forbes.com

Your office will have the opportunity to represent for two of these celebrities represent. The two will be chosen at random. You will be paid 10% of their earnings paid. What are the chances that you will be among the _____.$ 6
miljoen en \$ 7 million gets paid?
